#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll read_int() {
char c = gc();
while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
ll ret = 0;
while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
c = gc();
}
return ret;
}
int main()
{
    ll n,i;
    cin>>n;
    string s;
    map<string,ll> m;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>s;
        m[s]++;
    }
    map<string,ll>::iterator it;
    for(it=m.begin();it!=m.end();++it)
    {
        cout<<it->first<<" "<<it->second<<'\n';
    }
    return 0;
}
